verses.text: \w And|strong="H3063"\w* Josaphat \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hanani|strong="H2607"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w seer|strong="H2374"\w* met \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: Thou helpest \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w ungodly|strong="H7563"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou art joined \w in|strong="H5921"\w* friendship \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* thou didst deserve \w indeed|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* works \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thee, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w taken|strong="H4672"\w* \w away|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* groves \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* hast \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy fathers.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Josaphat \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* Bersabee \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H3063"\w* \w set|strong="H5975"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fenced \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Juda, \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H5975"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* charging \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Take|strong="H7200"\w* \w heed|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* exercise \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* whatsoever \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* redound \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all \w things|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* diligence: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w nor|strong="H0369"\w* \w respect|strong="H6343"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* persons, \w nor|strong="H0369"\w* desire \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w gifts|strong="H7810"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* Josaphat \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w chiefs|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w families|strong="H0001"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w judge|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w cause|strong="H7379"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* inhabitants thereof.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w faithfully|strong="H0530"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w perfect|strong="H8003"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w cause|strong="H7379"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w between|strong="H0996"\w* kindred \w and|strong="H0935"\w* kindred, wheresoever \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* question \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ceremonies, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* justifications: shew \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* sin \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* sin.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Amarias \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* high \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shell \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w regard|strong="H5973"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Zabadias \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ismahel, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda, \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w matters|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w belong|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingâ€™s|strong="H4428"\w* office: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w masters|strong="H7218"\w*, \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w courage|strong="H2388"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* diligently, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w*.
